title: No Friendly Error Message for Empty Series Data
description: The software should display a user-friendly error message when there is no data for a series.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed. The software does not provide any feedback to the user, which can lead to confusion.
EB: When there is no data for a series, the software should pop up a friendly error message to remind the user that there is no data available for the selected series.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the software.
2. Go to a series with no data available.
3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
